modName: Extreme Graphic Mod Pack by Fabianku
summary: This is my mod pack which will make your Skyrim look like hell! I use mods  such as enb and texture packs. And some game enhancement mods like merchands have more money or more item stock or Malukah singing the theme song for Skyrim ;)
descriptionHtml:
[b]FIRST OF ALL:[/b]
I made none of this mods. This is just the compilation of the mods i liked the most!
So i am not the owner of them.

[b]WHAT IS THIS MOD? :[/b]
this is a compilation of Skyrim mods, that will make your Skyrim look much much better. I have some gameplay changes too but very small ones you wont even recognise but are better than normal. 

[b]WHY:[/b]
it was soo much work to look for all the mods to make my Skyrim look beautiful and to make the gameplay a lil\' bit better. I never found a compilation of mods, which would have made it much easier and so i decided to make one with the mods i found.

And to prevent misunderstandings: i asked the creators of the mod if i i am allowed to use their mods and got their permission.



[b]PERFORMANCE[/b]

Now with better performance. Finally my ENB is used after completing it a few days ago and now it\'s ready to use.
It has the same strong colours as sharpshooters ENB but uses MUCH MUCH less performance.

[b]MODLIST:[/b]

[b]UPDATE: 1.1 [/b]
now with 4k water textures and 4k rocks and mountains

[b]THIS MODS ARE TO DOWNLOAD MANUALLY![/b]

[u]Perfect Power and Performance ENB by Fabianku [/u]...... http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/edit/?go=go&id=26988
[u]Skyrim Realistic Overhaul:[/u] .......        http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5400
[u]Skyrim HD full Town: [/u]      .......         http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/607
[u]Serious HD texture Landscape:[/u] ....... http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2146
[u]Re-defined Dungeons:  [/u]       .......     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3147
[u]High resolution Armors:  [/u]     .......     http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2009


[b]THE FILES BELOW ARE IN THE DOWNLOAD SECTION![/b]


[u]Static mesh improvement mod [/u]........  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8655

[u]HQ towns [/u].......       http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3467

[u]Road snow Footprints:    [/u]      .......   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7824
[u]A Quality world map:      [/u]      .......   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4929

[u]Skyrim bigger Trees:         [/u]   .......      http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/searchresults/?

[u]unlimited enchants for uniques:[/u] ...... http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21562
[u]Legendary smithing upgrades:[/u] .......  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1690
[u]increased Merchand stock: [/u]   .......    http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8223
[u]training costs:             [/u]    .......         http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2746
[u]Spells will give off light:  [/u]   .......      http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8479
[u]Nightingale with DB enchants:[/u] ........  http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1610
[u]Elemental fury fix:    [/u]        ........       http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14898
[u]rich merchants:       [/u]       .......          http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8169


[b]REQUIREMENTS/b]
Don not use this mod if you cant run the normal Skyrim on max settings without lag and at least 30-40 FPS. If this is the case your PC will melt. You\'ll at least need 4gb ram and 1gb of graphic memory.


[b]INSTALL:[/b] to install it simply extract the downloaded folder to your skyrim\\mods(the NMM folder) and install in the manager. Or you can just download with the mod manager and it should install on its own.
except for the 4gb ram mod. this is an exe!


[b]Plugins[/b]
You have! to untick the plugins:
realistic lighting.esp
realistic lighting Addon.esp
realistic lighting Patcher.esp
green water fix
If they are activated your Skyrim will crash immediately after the Bethesta sign.

[b]Here is video: (please excuse the lagging. My pc cant handle it with Fraps running)[/b]

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7TXgX_0s52Q&feature=youtu.be


[u][b]And don\'t forget to Endorse if you liked it ^^ [/b] [/u]

Thanx gl and hf with it ^^
author: Fabianku
